original_text: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers, and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury.
korean_text: 그러면 네가 마땅히 내 돈을 취리하는 자들에게나 맡겼다가 내가 돌아와서 내 원금과 이자를 받게 하였을 것이니라 하고

sentences.original_text: to have put my money to the exchangers
I should have received mine own with usury
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이자와 함께 내 돈을 받았을 것이니라
